FOR ALL OF THOSE WITH CARDS THAT DON'T SUPPORT DIRECT X11 USE THIS SWITCH ON THE LAUNCHER .EXE

-d3d9

Eg.

"C:\FEAR 3\F.E.A.R. 3.exe" -d3d9

ENJOY!!
